argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` K ) = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( TopOpen ` K ) = ( TopOpen ` K ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_istps | |- ( K e. TopSp <-> ( TopOpen ` K ) e. ( TopOn ` ( Base ` K ) ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_resttopon2 | |- ( ( ( TopOpen ` K ) e. ( TopOn ` ( Base ` K ) ) /\ A e. V ) -> ( ( TopOpen ` K ) |`t A ) e. ( TopOn ` ( A i^i ( Base ` K ) ) ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylanb | |- ( ( K e. TopSp /\ A e. V ) -> ( ( TopOpen ` K ) |`t A ) e. ( TopOn ` ( A i^i ( Base ` K ) ) ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( K |`s A ) = ( K |`s A ) |
| 7 | 6, 1 | #P_ressbas | |- ( A e. V -> ( A i^i ( Base ` K ) ) = ( Base ` ( K |`s A ) ) ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_adantl | |- ( ( K e. TopSp /\ A e. V ) -> ( A i^i ( Base ` K ) ) = ( Base ` ( K |`s A ) ) ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ( K e. TopSp /\ A e. V ) -> ( TopOn ` ( A i^i ( Base ` K ) ) ) = ( TopOn ` ( Base ` ( K |`s A ) ) ) ) |
| 10 | 5, 9 | #P_eleqtrd | |- ( ( K e. TopSp /\ A e. V ) -> ( ( TopOpen ` K ) |`t A ) e. ( TopOn ` ( Base ` ( K |`s A ) ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_eqid | |- ( Base ` ( K |`s A ) ) = ( Base ` ( K |`s A ) ) |
| 12 | 6, 2 | #P_resstopn | |- ( ( TopOpen ` K ) |`t A ) = ( TopOpen ` ( K |`s A ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_istps | |- ( ( K |`s A ) e. TopSp <-> ( ( TopOpen ` K ) |`t A ) e. ( TopOn ` ( Base ` ( K |`s A ) ) ) ) |
| 14 | 10, 13 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( K e. TopSp /\ A e. V ) -> ( K |`s A ) e. TopSp ) |
